body_html:
Hi Jart,

Thank you for your reply. I am pretty sure that the Tensorflow is the GPU CUDA version. I tried running Bazel from inside the models repository like you suggested.
But it says Bazel not found.

I am not an admin user for the GPU and I don't have the permissions to install Bazel.
body_text:
Hi Jart,
Thank you for your reply. I am pretty sure that the Tensorflow is the GPU CUDA version. I tried running Bazel from inside the models repository like you suggested.

body:
Hi Jart, 

Thank you for your reply. I am pretty sure that the Tensorflow is the GPU CUDA version. I tried running Bazel from inside the models repository like you suggested. 
But it says Bazel not found.

I am not an admin user for the GPU and I don't have the permissions to install Bazel.
